mapper.select:
SELECT dt.GUID, dt.DBTABLENAME, dt.NAME, dt.REMARK, dt.TABSWHERE, dt.APPID, dt.YEARPART, dt.PROVINCEPART, dt.TASKPART, dt.INITIALIZE, dt.ISLEAD, dt.CHANGEDISTRICT FROM DICT_T_SETTINGTABINFO dt WHERE 1 = 1
AND dt.DBTABLENAME LIKE '%${queryDBName}%'
AND dt.NAME LIKE '%${queryTableName}%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DICT_T_SETTINGTABINFO (DBTABLENAME, NAME, REMARK, TABSWHERE, APPID, YEARPART, PROVINCEPART, TASKPART, INITIALIZE, ISLEAD, CHANGEDISTRICT) VALUES (#{DBTABLENAME}, #{NAME}, #{REMARK}, #{TABSWHERE}, #{APPID}, #{YEARPART}, #{PROVINCEPART}, #{TASKPART}, #{INITIALIZE}, #{ISLEAD}, #{CHANGEDISTRICT})
